title: 179 - A State of The Pod Union
description: Today’s episode kicks off Ty Schmit welcoming the boys back from the weekend, as we are still missing our Canadian pal Gump. As we gear up for football season in the office it is with great sadness we have to announce that The Pod will now be cut DAHN to only one episode a week. The boys jump right into the Pod FOD, which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today’s FOD includes a “What if” the Marvel series was casted in the ’90’s, Connor’s latest mistress, for the first time ever a live news break, and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
